tag_professor: Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Hes passionate about his class, but extremely rude to students. Hell call you out on something minor. Will give you a hard time when it comes to be long late; even if its 10 min. Hes not empathetic to any excuses. But does have a absent rule. You cannot be on your phone and no pictures of the notes, We had to get 3 and only used 1 sometimes

tag_professor: Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: I really hate history, but Mr. Swanson made me hate it a little less. His lectures are enthusiastic and interesting, and he is always happy to answer questions and help you if you\'re struggling. He is very passionate about what he teaches. He is nice, unless you\'re on your phone or sleeping. Then he\'ll call you out.

tag_professor: Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
stu_tags: SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  LECTURE HEAVY
comments: Great teacher. The Midterm was just an in class essay. He gives you the prompt ahead of time so you can prepare. 1 research paper and 5 quizzes. The final was also an essay with some MC questions. Overall great teacher and not to difficult class.

tag_professor: Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: no homework. gives take home essays. He\'s funny and extremely passionate. Would take him again but sadly he only teaches evening classes. Extra credit given during class so attend his classes!

tag_professor: Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: He welcomed discussions. It was 2 take home essays, 5 quizzes (10 questions), 1 midterm and 1 final. He gives out prompts or the midterm and final. As long as you remember all the points for the exams then you will get the A. It was really simple. Attending class is mandatory as he gives out extra credit randomly in class session.

tag_professor: Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: I took this class once a week in the evening. Not bad. He\'s pretty funny and his lectures aren\'t boring. Definitely read the chapters listed for the midterm and final. You can kind of get by just skimming through the other chapters, but I\'d highly recommend to pay attention during the lectures so you pass the quizzes.

tag_professor: Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Summer class was fast paced, he was passionate about HIST. Staying thru the whole class not as bad but he doesn\'t let you out early. Participation assignments in class & only 2 extra credit videos. 2 take home essays & 2 in class essays (midterm & final w/50 questions to answer). There are quizzes & he gives you questions for essays ahead of time.

tag_professor: Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Mr.Swanson is such a cool guy. Very understanding and his class was easy peasy. He shouts a lot but just for fun...if you have sensitive ears sit in the back. Overall a great teacher and if you try you will pass.

tag_professor: Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: I love Swanson! He\'s really cool, just do your work, show up to class and the best of all its that there\'s only 2 essays in the class and a research paper of only 6 pages. Not bad compared to other history classes. Don\'t use your cell phone and if you show up late just send him an email. Great class and energy.

tag_professor: Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Swanson\'s awesome! He\'s super clear in his lectures and the only homework is to read. Midterm isn\'t so bad and his pop-quizzes are reasonable if you read the book - skimming the chapter is okay, too. ATTENDANCE IS MANDATORY. Y\'all will love him if you don\'t use your cell phones, too. :)

tag_professor: Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: His funny and he could be boring. He gives the question to the final so that you know what are you going to write in your essay. FINALS=ESSAY. he gives you low grade for small mistakes. he is very sensitive about attendance, texting and he is always on time! but overall his great!

tag_professor: Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: I would say I used to hate History class, but now I understand it. He wakes you up; loud teacher. My boyfriend took his class before me; when I got his class, he embarrassed me. As long as you go to class, not be late (15 minutes; close the door), return everything on time (he has specific dates and times), and NOT TEXT IN CLASS. Your\'ll be fine.

tag_professor: Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Mr. Swanson is a very angry and unreasonable person. When asked a simple question, he got defensive and didn\'t answer it. He yells through the entire class. At 8 AM this is hard to stomach so early in the morning. He is unreasonably strict about attendence, being on time, and assignments. He gives low grades for small mistakes. Spare yourself.

tag_professor: Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: He\'s like a dictator when teaching the class; break a rule and you\'re out immediately. Most of the time he has sand in his v*gina and releases his bottled up rage on a poor student who isn\'t disrupting the class at all. Also, miss his class for 6 days and you\'re out,no joke. In my opinion, he was bullied before and now the roles have been reversed.

tag_professor: Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: class was easy. yet he\'s a much of a control freak. sometimes he makes you look bad when you were late or asked a simple question. he knows his material. he can talk for 2 straight hours by himself in the early morning. i ve seen girls violated the class rules but only guys got thrown out.

tag_professor: Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Very interesting and fun class. This professor is very helpful and answers questions well, making sure you understand.

tag_professor: Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Loved this class! He is so passionate about the subject and always willing to help you out! His lectures aren\'t boring, gives out small quizzes, and tells you what you need to know for the exams. He allows you to miss a few classes but hey, if you don\'t want to go to class then take it online. Highly Recommend! (which I don\'t often do).

tag_professor: Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Love this Mr. Swanson!!! best history teacher ever! really knows and loves the subject, and his lectures are quite entertaining! you won\'t ever get bored!! do the assigments, reading helps but if you pay attention to the lectures and do your work, you should be fine!

tag_professor: Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Passionate about history. One of the best teachers I have had so far. Made history fun, easy, and interesting. Take him, you wont regret it.

tag_professor: Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: He is very enthusiastic about history and his lectures are quite theatrical. Strict on attendance as he likes to throw out pop quizzes and participation work if you decide not to show up. Seems to love what he does, and it shows when he lectures. Nice teacher, and not overloaded with a lot of work.
